location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Muscat to William Simson, Acting Persian Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication, dated 29 June 1824, which enclosed letters for Prince Hoossen Ally Mirza [Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mirzā] and Mirza Mohomed Ali Khan [Mirzā Muḥammad ‘Alī Khān] of Shiraz . It is also acknowledging a dispatch, dated 7 October 1824, transmitting letters to Prince Abass Mirza [‘Abbās Mīrzā], and Mirza Abule Cassem Kayem Muckam.
